seo: IIS,短文件名漏洞,漏洞检测,微软IIS
summary: 该插件用于检测IIS服务器是否存在短文件名漏洞，攻击者可能利用此漏洞猜解或遍历服务器中的文件名，或者对IIS服务器进行拒绝服务攻击。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the IIS server has a short filename vulnerability. Attackers may use this vulnerability to guess or traverse filenames on the server, or perform denial-of-service attacks on the IIS server.
